price: (5) Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.[1287]
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ
footnotes: [1287]- i.e., each point or place of sunrise.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā warabbu al-mashāriqi
